= Terminate method =

*Project:* [ConsoleAppClasses  Console Application Runner Classes].

*Unit:* _PJConsoleApp_.

*Class:* _[TPJConsoleApp TPJConsoleApp]_.

*Introduced:* v1.0

{{{
procedure Terminate;
}}}

== Description ==

Attempts to terminate the process. Calling this method causes the _[TPJConsoleAppExecute Execute]_ method to return after the next _[TPJConsoleAppOnWork OnWork]_ event. If _[TPJConsoleAppKillTimedOutProcess KillTimedOutProcess]_ is `True` the console application will be halted. The method has no effect when _[TPJConsoleAppTimeSlice TimeSlice]_ is `INFINITE`.
